snippet: A Kickstarter campaign to raise money for a sequel to Maurice Sendak’s “Where the Wild Things Are” has been suspended over a copyright dispute.
abstract: Kickstarter campaign to raise money for sequel to Maurice Sendak book Where the Wild Things Are has been suspended over a copyright dispute with HarperCollins Publishers; new work, called Back to the Wild, is written by Geoffrey O Todd with illustrations by Rich Berner.
lead_paragraph: A Kickstarter campaign to raise money for a sequel to Maurice Sendak’s “Where the Wild Things Are” has been suspended over a copyright dispute.

headline.print_headline: Publisher Objects to Sequel to Sendak’s ‘Wild Things’
headline.main: Publisher Objects to Sequel to Sendak’s ‘Wild Things’
